Due to recent events that see me gearing up to climb the ladder in my job, I've decided I need to start dressing less casually. I saw this shirt in Navy blue and had to try it.  As summarized in my review title, I have no complaints. I normally wear a size XL shirt, so that's what I ordered. I'm happy to say this shirt in that size fits me as expected; It's not loose or tight in any way. I do note this shirt is a touch shorter in torso length than my normal go-to dress shirt, but there's still plenty to tuck into my pants waistband.  I've only worn this shirt a couple of times, and even with a machine wash, this shirt hasn't wrinkled up on me. Although, the machine wash did slightly ripple the shirt, so before I wear it to an occasion, I would probably iron it anyway.  There's not much else to say, but again, I'm really happy with this shirt!

4.75 Stars  I got this for my husband to wear for our Special Christmas kick off. I couldn't have asked for better! There was a slight odor when I opened it and it is a bit wrinkled BUT I hung it up and let it air out for about a week. The smell is gone and the wrinkles are nearly all gone. The color is a beautiful bright red that's perfect for Christmas. The size is perfect for him. Plenty of room without being baggy. Very professional looking. The material is very nice. Not stiff or scratchy. The cuffs, collar and buttons are all well sewn and look great. No loose threads and the wrinkles you see in my pictures are already falling out. I love it and it looks great on my husband. I Highly Recommend!
I love the material that is used,  it feels and fits great

I ordered the green COOFANDY Mens wrinkle free long sleeve dress shirt and it looks and feels great!  I love this shirt!  I've ordered a few COOFANDY brand clothing and I am always impressed with the quality of this brand.The dress shirt is 74% nylon and 26% spandex and it is the perfect combo for comfort.  The green color looks great and I'll be ordering in a couple additional colors so I can wear these for work - or for a weekend outing.

This shirt arrived in just 2 days.  I was very pleased.  It looks and feels very luxurious and stayed comfortable the whole time I wore it.  I wore it with dress pants, jacket and tie for church directory pictures.  The fabric was nice and stretchy, and the color was perfect.  I would highly recommend this to anyone.  My only issue is that the collar tips are pretty short, making it difficult to wear a tie with.  It took some time to make the tips of the collar lay down, but I was successful.  It turned out to be a minor complaint and I would give it 4.5 stars if I could.  This shirt was given to me through the Vine program for my honest review.  That is what I wrote.

This shirt is great as it's manufactured of great quality.  Size and color just as described.  It's absolutely wrinkle free even after coming out of a dryer.  It's easy to wash clean and dry.  Excellent fit for every day wearing.

评论概述: Men's Long Sleeved Dress Shirt is a Standout
评论详情: I ordered this shirt specifically for Christmas and Valentine's Day. It is probably the brightest shade of red and has a really nice fit. I have a feeling I will wear it to other events when I want to stand out in the crowd.
The fabric is skin-friendly and comfortable. The sewing on the buttons seems a bit off but that’s the only drawback.

I own several COOFANDY apparel and I have always found them value priced and of high quality. This shirt follows that pattern. The 74% nylon and 26% spandex material leaves you with a shirt that really has an incredible feel against the skin with substantial stretch as you move. This shirt can be dressed up in a formal setting or dressed down with a pair of jeans. It is a regular fit....I did not find it as a "slim cut" at the waist. In regard to the sizing....I was not sure how do use their size chart. I am a 42 chest with a bit of a paunch, 5' 9" tall and 175 pounds. According to their chart, I should be a Small, which would be ridiculous. I ordered my regular size, Large.....which was the right choice. My advice is to order your usual size and forget the size chart. All in all....its a great shirt. Definitely recommended
